comment.author: 67237712@N04
comment._content: Yoder looks quite pensive in his early life

comment.author: 52529054@N06
comment._content: Thanks for your comment, Grant.  I think he remained pensive as he aged ;-)  Seriously, we have a huge collection of Yoder's personal papers.  I generally recommend to undergrads interested in Yoder that they find a very, very narrow topic so as not to exhaust themselves with research.
